items.sentence: Tom asked Mary to pass him the salt and pepper.
I don\'t like the neighborhood where Tom lives.
I don\'t often have the chance to speak French.
I don\'t want to drink any more beer right now.
Tom\'s car is parked in front of Mary\'s house.
I think I have to begin working on my homework.
I think Tom, without question, is going to win.
Why don\'t you try it again from the beginning?
Tom said he didn\'t want any of us to help him.
Tom didn\'t know what Mary\'s phone number was.
